items.value: All factions start with <color=#FB6F37>Peaceful ideologies</color>. For this to change, the leaders must first be replaced with ones that have appropriate <color=#FB6F37>negative Traits.</color>\n\nThen figure out a way to make the Factions <color=#FB6F37>declare war</color> against each other. The <color=#FB6F37>Meddler</color> is the most straightforward option. For more challenge, skip the Meddler and exploit the fact that Factions may also declare war on those that commit <color=#FB6F37>serious crimes</color> against them.
